question: How do I connect the App to Research Drive?
answer: You can connect the app to the research drive on the connect page. The easiest way is to connect by OAUTH. This will automatically create a application password and find your username and use these to connect. Alternatively you can create an application password yourself in the research drive settings and use it together with your research drive username in the form to login.

question: How do I download data?
answer: Once you have connected the app and your repository, you can download data on the download page. Simply select your connected repository, paste the url of the data source in the data url field, and fill out the name of the destination folder in the data folder name field and press preview download. You will first get a preview of all the data dat will be downloaded. If that looks good, then press 'Start Download'.

question: How can I see the status of the data download?
answer: Once the data download has started, you will see a message in the status table saying 'started'. Once the download is ready you will see a message saying 'ready'. You can check and see the status of the current and historical downloads on the history page.
